content:
WebOperationContext Class

Definition

A helper class that provides easy access to contextual properties of Web requests and responses.

In this Article

public class WebOperationContext : System.ServiceModel.IExtension<System.ServiceModel.OperationContext>
Inheritance
System.Object
WebOperationContext

Inherited Members

Initializes a new instance of the WebOperationContext class with the specified OperationContext instance.

operationContext
OperationContext

The operation context.

Properties

Current

Gets the current Web operation context.

public static System.ServiceModel.Web.WebOperationContext Current { get; }
Value
WebOperationContext

A WebOperationContext instance.

IncomingRequest

Gets the Web request context for the request being received.

public System.ServiceModel.Web.IncomingWebRequestContext IncomingRequest { get; }
Value
IncomingWebRequestContext

An IncomingWebRequestContext instance.

IncomingResponse

Gets the Web response context for the request being received.

public System.ServiceModel.Web.IncomingWebResponseContext IncomingResponse { get; }
Value
IncomingWebResponseContext

An IncomingWebResponseContext instance.

OutgoingRequest

Gets the Web request context for the request being sent.

public System.ServiceModel.Web.OutgoingWebRequestContext OutgoingRequest { get; }
Value

An OutgoingWebRequestContext instance.

OutgoingResponse

Gets the Web response context for the response being sent.

public System.ServiceModel.Web.OutgoingWebResponseContext OutgoingResponse { get; }
Value

An OutgoingWebResponseContext instance.
